about_the_game:
Let's play Desktop Baseball!
Master simple controls and think up complex tricks and strategies!

Desktop Baseball 2 brings ballparks with all sorts of features!
Observe the situation keenly and hit the ball left or right!

Customize your players and freely design your team!
Set your sights on making your team one of a kind!

[Practice Game]
Enjoy a light and fun single player match!
Adjust the number of innings to set up a practice match, a full game, or anything in-between!

[Friendly Game]
Try out 2-player mode with a friend!
Strategize well and victory will be within your grasp!

[Team Selection]
Adjust everything from your team members' names, positions, and batting order in General Settings to visual details in Style Settings and craft a team to your liking!
Change up uniforms, bats, pitches, and more to complete your own unique team!

[Tournament]
Challenge the Champion Cup with the teams you've made!
Hone your skills until you're ready to compete on the world stage!

[Capsule Home Run]
Use the points you've earned in other modes to get items like new uniforms and bats!
With more items come more ways to build a team unique to you!

[Mini Game]
Earn points in Knock Rush!
Win tons of points by pulling off a brilliant defense!

*Controllers are required for multiplayer play.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R7 Graphics / Intel® HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller Recommended
